resources.string: Simple memo app for snagging ideas and tagging them.
create table memo ( _id integer primary key autoincrement, body text not null, slug text not null, created text not null, updated text not null );
create table memo_tag ( _id integer primary key autoincrement, memo_id integer, tag_id integer, foreign key (memo_id) references memo(_id), foreign key (tag_id) references tag(_id) );
